Desserts Early Riser.

Have a flakey light weight dessert for a day starter. Served best with a hot, steaming cup of coffee!

Desserts for the Healthy.

Sweet treats that are low calorie and healthy so that you can still enjoy a snack without the worry!

desserts for Occassion

Making sure you bring the right dessert to the right event. Large portioned desserts are best for feeding large groups of people.

Baked Desserts

Hot, fresh baked treats fresh from the oven! Every kind of baked good you are looking for can be found here. Just simply pick from our categories of baked goods or scroll down to look through our menu page by page.

Categories:

  • Pie
  • Cake
  • Cupcakes
  • Cookies
  • Pastry
  • Tarts

Cheesecake

★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆

Delicious fluffy cheesecake with peanut and chocolate drizzel. Served with a side of fresh cut fruit.

Muffins

★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆

Bite-sized, freshly baked, fluffy bran muffins with chocolate bits. Best served with a hot cup of coffee.

Croissant

★ ★ ★ ★ ☆

Flakey, buttery and perfect with breakfast. A hot croissant is perfect with a light butter and cup of coffee.

White Chocolate Brownie

★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆

Decident white chocolate, milk-chocolate chip brownie. A great treat for bakesales and platters.

Bundt Cake

★ ★ ☆ ☆ ☆

Moist, fluffy cake with raisins and icing sugar. Perfect with jam filling in the center or at parties.

Frosted Cinnamon Bun

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

The breakfast of champions, better than any bagel or egg. A soft cinnamon bun with vanilla frosting.
